html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08272024-06-21TC, FIN
ActCanada Marine Act
SubjectSaguenay Port Authority ** LETTERS PATENT ** **AMENDMENT**
PrecisOrder approving the supplementary LETTERS PATENT provision amending Article 9 of the Letters Patent issued to the SAGUENAY PORT AUTHORITY (SPA) to create a project-specific borrowing limit of $36.8 million, on the power of the SPA to borrow money on its credit for port purposes, in addition to its general borrowing limit.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the supplementary LETTERS PATENT provision amending Article 9 of the Letters Patent issued to the SAGUENAY PORT AUTHORITY (SPA) to create a project-specific borrowing limit of $36.8 million, on the power of the SPA to borrow money on its credit for port purposes, in addition to its general borrowing limit.
